NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 POKE: The installation of the paired warp cores in the core of the Deep Storm Station is complete, my friends! 2 1 POKE: After the test, we will be able to study how conducting high quantities of energy will affect the warp cores, allowing us to better refine and improve the advanced warp core we are crafting for the Ash Twin Project. 3 1 CASSAVA: My gratitude for your hard work, Poke. After the test is complete, could we perhaps.. repurpose these warp cores for the warp tower connecting Giant's Deep to Ash Twin? 4 3 POKE: We could, as the warp cores are paired! But it would be a waste of warp cores engineered to handle far stronger energy... Oh, you were just nagging me about Giant's Deep's warp tower once more. 5 4 POKE: Your helpful, daily, reminders are not needed, Cassava! All I can do is promise that it is being worked on.. DSS CONV4 1
